title: cmd/test: make it easy to -cover and browse
body:
Cover tool requires two steps to produce HTML from the coverage data whereas, as a user, I am often interested in being able to see the coverage results page as quickly as possible when running go test cover.

I am proposing that we should slightly modify the behavior of the -html flag to combine `go test -coverprofile=c.out` and `go tool cover -html=c.out` when -html="".

If -html="" is breaking anything, we may introduce a new flag like -browse.

/cc @bradfitz @adg @broady
